name: Battle o'er the Barren Moon
description:
ok, just like Life of a Spacemarine is a fork of VEE (unofficial Warhammer 40K fangame: Victory Exterminatus Extremis),  this is also a fork,... but in the "orbital bambardment" direction (and will eventually get merged into VEE)

so, here I'm just focusing on simulating the voidship.. no characters, no space travel, no Warpentities, etc. 

working on simulating spacemarines (I eventually want to be able to show an entire Chapter on screen, so please excuse the crappy graphics) https://derrickmoore.itch.io/loasm

and main game, Victory Exterminatus Extremis.. I'm trying to narrow down the game play to it's barest elements... so right now it's just a game about .. oh crap.. i just realized.. it's a game about taxation of the outlaying regions.. well, it'll get more exciting, later on.. been working on the game 2 years, while I'm learning to code, I figure it will take another 3 years to complete.. and then, I'll be ready for my "dream game"... one where the Player is one of the Lost Primarchs. 

https://derrickmoore.itch.io/journey-to-terra-an-unofficial-40k-fangame

(I think I can do it, i've worked on some pretty good games in the past)

Oct 15th.. remaking planets and solar systems from scratch.. really just looking at the scale of the planets.. and I want them to be about to scale with the ships, and have some moons in there, not too far away, not too close.... but not exactly realistic distances, becasue it's Warhammer, so more extreme stuff..
